statements: UPDATE campaign_performance_data SET impressions = 5000, spend = 2500.50 WHERE campaign_id = 101
UPDATE campaign_performance_data SET spend = 1500, impressions = 3000 WHERE campaign_id = 102
UPDATE campaign_performance_data SET spend = spend + 1000, impressions = impressions - 500 WHERE campaign_id = 1

UPDATE campaign_optimization SET budget = 1500, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE campaign_id = 2;

UPDATE campaign_clicks SET click_count = 10, click_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE click_id = 201;
UPDATE campaign_performance_data SET impressions = 500, conversions = 50 WHERE campaign_id = 100;
UPDATE campaign_clicks SET click_count = 20, click_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE impression_id = 200;
UPDATE campaigns SET budget = 5000 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE ads SET cost_per_click = 2.50, ad_type = 'banner' WHERE ad_id = 3;
UPDATE campaigns SET budget = 1500.00, start_date = '2022-03-01' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE ad_performance SET clicks = 100, revenue = 500.50 WHERE ad_id = 201 AND date = '2022-04-15';

UPDATE campaign_costs SET cost = 2500.00, date = '2022-05-10' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET impressions = impressions + 100, conversions = conversions + 10 WHERE campaign_id = 123;
UPDATE campaign_costs SET cost = cost - 25.50, date = '2022-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = 456;
